channel.title: CSS on A Developer's Experience
channel.description: Recent content in CSS on A Developer's Experience

item.title: Degooling
item.description: A rundown of alternatives for degoogling based on recent conversations with friends and acquitances. There are alternatives that are user privacy friendly, and some of them free. Besides, do not get emotionally attached to a name. Brand names are not functionalities. Don’t hesistate to ditch a product/company in the case of foul play.

item.title: Now I'll have padding both ways
item.description: In my CSS tinkering endeavors, I can’t believe I was ignorant of the existence of the very properties that I have been longing for. I am delighted I finally found it.
